text:
e="preserve">Thomas Kopache (born October 17, 1945) is an American actor. He was born in Manchester, New Hampshire. He is known for his roles as Assistant Secretary of State Bob Slatterly in "The West Wing" and for roles in the "Star Trek" franchise. He has also appeared in the stage productions of "As You Like It" as the banished Duke and in "Antigone" as Creon.
In 2017, Kopache appeared on the HBO show "Last Week Tonight" with John Oliver as the "Catheter Cowboy", a character based on a commercial that aired on networks such as Fox News. The character appears on commercials produced by Oliver which airs on Fox to educate President Donald Trump.
